title: Stack Practice Challenge
description: Create a profile header with: 1. Background image 2. Profile photo overlaid 3. Name overlay at bottom ---
instructions: Create a profile header with: 1. Background image 2. Profile photo overlaid 3. Name overlay at bottom ---

hints.text: Stack places widgets on top of each other - first child is bottom layer
Use Positioned.fill for background, Positioned(bottom:) for overlay text

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to give Stack a height
commonMistakes.consequence: Stack collapses or has zero height
commonMistakes.correction: Wrap Stack in SizedBox with explicit height

commonMistakes.mistake: Children clipped when overflowing Stack bounds
commonMistakes.consequence: Profile photo cut off at container edge
Widgets pile up at top-left corner
